# Guarded Life, Greater (Ex)
## Overview
*Guarded Life, Greater (Ex)*: When using the [[Guarded Life (Ex)|guarded life]] rage power, 1 additional hit point of lethal damage per barbarian level is converted to nonlethal damage. A barbarian must have the [[Guarded Life (Ex)|guarded life]] rage power and be at least 6th level before selecting this rage power.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 27
